post.body: Indeed! My 75 year old granmother requested it for Christmas.
Eat, Reading, Sleeping, Driving (oh so bad), merging files @ work ironing, walking, shooting the breeze, cuddling, shopping, Yeah
work & wanna go home already. This side hustle sucks.
Indeed I have learned that the hard way Older, Younger, In between.
its just as superficial as meeting someone in person. I didn't know that adults were still so shallow..
Prep you ain't never lied!
work again busting out the OT & Holiday pay.
I'm off 2day and I don't have anything 2do. My pre-teen wants 2 go 2 the mall for a Wii game from Game Stop. & my 4 year old wants Sephora.
If my manager calls me 1 more time trying 2 get me 2 come in LOL 3 people called out sick serves them right for the sideways crap they do.
Todays Oprah has me thinking of my dad He was a dog lover, stray catcher and breeder eventhough he was homeless the last 2 years of his life
Why am I NOT getting my Myspace or Facebook notifications and icon popups? I love it when my notification icons are all alerting me. WTH man
8 million dogs w/out homes that's said but how many people w/dogs w/out homes or just rather how many people w/out homes? Justfood 4 thought
Almost done @ work half an hour to go, but oh no can't leave we have a mandatory nursing staff meeting. Let the hoopla begin!
I haven't eaten beef in a while. My mom made T-bones, mashed potatos and broccoli with cheese sauce. Let's just say it went down over here.
So ready for bed.
Finally my hair is done! When its free u have to wait
My daughter is addicted to chocolate, especially Hershey's with almond.
I have 2 b @ work in 20 minutes. It goes without saying that I do not want 2 go. Pray for me ya'll, or better yet pray for the residents.
Happy Christmas Twitters!
Some homeless dude just asked could he use my cell. I would have let him cause I'm a good that way, but I could see his earwax 3 feet away.
